content.title: Mapping the UI Elements to the Service
content.body:
• From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField - tbxLastName and select text{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, LastName{string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField - tbxNickName and select text{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, NickName{string}.
  • From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand TextField - tbxPhone and select text{string}.
    From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, Phone{string}.
